data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Scudder, G. G. E. (2016): A review of the genus Entisberus Distant (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Rhyparochromidae: Drymini). Zootaxa 4083 (1): 143-150, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4083.1.8|58 occurrences
